profile.headline: Senior Backend / Full Stack Developer
profile.status: Unemployed, and I am actively looking for a new role

origin: Hey. My name is Alexander and I am a Senior Backend / Full Stack Developer.
I have great experience in the best and the most successful companies, such as Badoo, Topface and StarLine, where I worked on highload projects in a key department of internal development.

I have been working as programmer more than 12 years with PHP and JavaScript, and I have strong knowledges of development complex systems requiring a high level of security, highload and tests. Of course, I have commercial experience as Back-End (PHP 5/7, MySql, Redis) and Front-End (JavaScript, React, Native JS, ES6, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, LESS) developer in success companies.
short: Highly motivated seasoned software engineer with 12 years of rich experience in web software development.

requirements: I require a sponsorship for a new role in the UK (Tier 2 General Visa)

experience.title: Senior PHP Developer
experience.description: Badoo is the largest dating network in the world. With 370 million users across 190 countries and 450 employees worldwide, Badoo provides the best technology for people to meet, because happiness is better shared. Each day more than 400,000 people sign up for a Badoo experience; users send over 350 million messages and 10 million photos are added to the Badoo platform. Users spend an average of 1.8 hours daily on the Badoo experience, for a total of over 12 billion swipes per day.
duties: Backend supporting and development of user profiles, photos, user verification service, external and private projects of the company.
DB architecture design, highload optimization, testing, code review and so on.
Development of proxy service for avoiding connections blocks.
Implementation A/B testing, new features, GDPR.
Optimization and testing of code, review and so on.

experience.title: Senior PHP / JavaScript Developer
experience.description: Currency Solutions is a rather large Foreign Exchange firm, that unlike other companies, that usually handle both smaller and larger payments, focuses only on large transfers.
duties: Front-end development (JavaScript + React) for a service of global money transfer.
Backend development for the money transfer service, REST API, DB architecture, highload optimization, testing, code review and so on.
Support and development CRM system of the company.

experience.title: Senior PHP Developer
experience.description: Topface is world famous social network for datings with more than 90 million users. Development for highload: ~90rps, ~1.5 mln users daily.
duties: Development of the user's activity system structure  and DB architecture (such as messages, sympathies, gifts and so on) to increase stability, safety, speed, failover and highload.
The development of the intellectual system for counting user's activity, with automatic recalculation in case of failures.
The implementation A/B testing, and monetization experiments.
Backend development for highload, DB architecture, DB architecture, testing, code review

experience.title: Senior PHP / JavaScript Developer
experience.description: StarLine is a service for transport monitoring and remote alarms, and sensors control.
duties: Backend and frontend development
Development for highload
Development of algorithms for tracks analysis
Team php & js lead
Interview of candidates for opened vacancies in the company

experience.title: Full Stack Web Developer
experience.description: M2C ltd is the largest provider of Internet, digital television and telephony in Murmansk.
duties: Development and maintenance of internal & external services of the company
Integration billing with external payment systems
Development web-service for control under digital television
Development of advertising management system
Development and design of database architecture
Flash Application Development
Work under new TV channel

projects.title: Open Source Projects on Github
description: Also I have received a certificate for free license for all products of JetBrains for the contribution and development to open source PHP projects.

projects.title: Game "Mazay Mahjong and bunnies"
description: It is my personal project, that I made in free time.

I designed a game concept, elements, levels, music. I analyzed the game logic and a user behavior, edited a design of the game, designed a system architecture for highload, and wrote front-end and back-end code. Also, I made a server configuration and software.
